text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
An unbelievable Horse Girl has appeared! Becoming an opponent 
even at the senior level!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: This is one of the five crowns, Narita Brian!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah… she shaked all the opponents who marked her…
Yeah… How far are you going to go beyond expectations, Brian…
Yeah… How far are you going to go beyond expectations, Brian…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahh～…! Trainer-san phone is ringing again…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Applying for an interview again!? How many more are there!
After yesterday's “Arima Kinen”, it was like this. Yes, helloー

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …I can't believe there's such a response…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Excuse my intrusion! Um, I'd like to set an interview for Narita 
Brian-san, the school phone's won't stop ringing…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehh～…! There's trouble here and there!

Race busting also the cheers, Narita Brian 
has gone far beyond the expectations…

Race busting also the cheers, Narita Brian 
has gone far beyond the expectations…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Even in this situation, where is the culprit walking～!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: “Triple Crown Horse Girl”, “Arima Kinen” conquest of 5 G1 wins…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Even so, my ambition isn't full, and my spirit is not satisfied.
